events.name: Coachella
events.caption: Coachella is a world-renowned festival held in the California desert, featuring performances from top artists, immersive art installations, and a vibrant cultural experience. Explore 14 homes in near in Indio, CA.

events.name: Art Basel
events.caption: Art Basel is a global art fair that connects artists, galleries, and collectors. The fair provides a platform for galleries to sell and show their work, and it also helps local art programs grow.

events.name: Sun Dance Festival
events.caption: Dramatic and documentary films, short films, episodic content, performances, exhibitions, virtual reality experiences, and filmmaker conversations
